fields.name: item
fields.description: Item - the item in the chest, or empty

fields.name: collectable
fields.description: Collectable - the collectable in the chest, or empty

fields.name: keyItem
fields.description: Key item - for keys and plot items that can be found in chests

fields.name: encounter
fields.description: Encounter - for booby-trapped chests

fields.name: visible
fields.description: Invisible - invisible chests don't appear

fields.name: scene
fields.description: Scene - plays after the chest is opened

fields.name: switchName
fields.description: Custom switch - switch name, or leave blank for autogen

fields.name: appearance
fields.description: Animation - what this event looks like, or null for invisible

fields.name: id
fields.description: ID - used by Tiled, leave blank

fields.name: passable
fields.description: Passability

fields.name: width
fields.description: Width of this event, in tiles

fields.name: height
fields.description: Height of this event, in tiles

fields.name: groups
fields.description: Group - any groups this NPC is in, when in doubt just leave blank, space seperated

fields.name: face
fields.description: Face - the direction this NPC faces

fields.name: hidden
fields.description: Display on/off

fields.name: hide
fields.description: Hide script - if this lua script evals to true, will not show this event

fields.name: onAdd
fields.description: onAdd - lua value, script is called when event is added to map

fields.name: onEnter
fields.description: onEnter - lua value, script is called when hero enters the map

fields.name: onRemove
fields.description: onRemove - lua value, script is called when event is removed from map

fields.name: onTurn
fields.description: onTurn - lua value, script is called every time it's this event's turn

fields.name: onCollide
fields.description: onCollide - lua value, script is called when player walks into this event

fields.name: onInteract
fields.description: onInteract - lua value, script is called when player talks to this event

fields.name: onBehavior
fields.description: onBehavior - lua value, called abritrarily once every couple seconds

fields.name: animate
fields.description: Animate - hack, put something here to be inanimate

fields.name: key
fields.description: The key of this object used in code -- don't change these!

fields.name: subfolder
fields.description: Used to subcategorize objects ("/bosses" or "/areas/towns" for instance)

fields.name: name
fields.description: The display name of this object, used only by humans like you

fields.name: description
fields.description: Notes and whatnot on this object
